table.title: Farm Information
table.searchTemplate: |inputlookup SPFarm |search Id="$FarmId$" |eval CEIP=if(CEIPEnabled=="True","Enabled","Disabled") |eval ErrorReporting=if(ErrorReportingEnabled=="True","Enabled","Disabled") |lookup Build BuildNumber as BuildVersion OUTPUTNEW BuildDescription |table Id,DisplayName,BuildVersion,BuildDescription,ErrorReporting,CEIP,Status |rename Id as GUID, DisplayName as Name, BuildVersion as Build, BuildDescription as Version, ErrorReporting as "Error Reporting", CEIP as "Customer Experience Reporting" |transpose

chart.title: Page Impressions (Last 24 hours)
chart.searchTemplate: eventtype=mssharepoint-iis | lookup SPServer Name AS host OUTPUTNEW FarmId | search FarmId="$FarmId$" | eval x=1 | timechart per_minute(x) as "Pages/Minute" by host

table.title: SQL Servers
table.searchTemplate: | inputlookup SPServer | search FarmId="$FarmId$" Role="Invalid" | lookup SQLHostInformation ComputerName as Name OUTPUTNEW OSVersion | rex field=OSVersion "^(?<OSBaseVersion>\d+\.\d+)" | lookup OSVersion OSBaseVersion OUTPUTNEW OSVersionName | table Name,OSVersionName | rename OSVersionName as "OS Version" | join Name [search eventtype=sql-perfmon-objects | chart avg(Value) by host,counter | rename "Avg. Disk sec/Transfer" AS D, "Page life expectancy" as M, "% Processor Time" as P, host as Name | eval D=round(D*1000,2) | eval M=round(M,2) | eval P=round(P,2) | rename D as "Disk Latency (ms)",M as "Page Life (s)", P as "% Processor Time" ]

table.title: Application Servers
table.searchTemplate: | inputlookup SPServer | search FarmId="$FarmId$" Role="Application" | lookup SPHostInfo host as Name OUTPUTNEW OSVersion,SharedToolsVersion | table Name,OSVersion,SharedToolsVersion | rename OSVersion as "OS Version", SharedToolsVersion as "Shared Tools"

table.title: Peak Network Latency (ms) Between Servers (last 24 hours)
table.searchTemplate: eventtype=mssharepoint-netlatency | lookup SPServer Name as host OUTPUT FarmId | search FarmId="$FarmId$" | lookup SPIPAddress IPAddress as Address OUTPUT host as ComputerName | where isnotnull(ComputerName) AND ComputerName!=host | chart max(ResponseTime) by host,ComputerName
